original_text: And the peoples will take them and bring them to their place, and the house of Israel will possess them in the Lord's land as male and female slaves. They will take captive those who were their captors, and rule over those who oppressed them.
korean_text: 민족들이 그들을 데리고 그들의 본토에 돌아오리니 이스라엘 족속이 여호와의 땅에서 그들을 얻어 노비로 삼겠고 전에 자기를 사로잡던 자들을 사로잡고 자기를 압제하던 자들을 주관하리라

sentences.original_text: And the peoples will take them
and bring them to their place
and the house of Israel will possess them
They will take captive those who were their captors
and rule over those who oppressed them
